name: BarFLY (Fergalmcm)
description:
BarFLY is an arcade adventure about the high-intensity, low-reward world of space-faring robotic bar-tending.

Travel space from your single-sleeper spacecraft while taking remote-work  bar shifts to pay for fuel and the occasional sector bribe.

Work your way to Earth, navigating the bureaucracy and corporate culture  of the far future.

Keep customers happy, filling orders with bottles, pints and even cocktails!
